gameframework.particles.behaviors

Class MovingParticleBehavior

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameframework.particles.behaviors.ParticleBehavior
      • gameframework.particles.behaviors.MovingParticleBehavior

  • public class MovingParticleBehavior
extends ParticleBehavior
    This behavior will move the particles at a specified speed and angle

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MovingParticleBehavior(ParticleBehavior behavior, int speed, double minAngle, double maxAngle)
      Constructor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void update(Particle particle)
      Will move the particle according to its speed and angle

      • Methods inherited from class gameframework.particles.behaviors.ParticleBehavior

        isDead, isDrawn

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • MovingParticleBehavior

        public MovingParticleBehavior(ParticleBehavior behavior,
                              int speed,
                              double minAngle,
                              double maxAngle)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        behavior - Particle's behavior
        speed - Speed of the movement
        minAngle - Minimum angle of the movement (in radian)
        maxAngle - Maximum angle of the movement (in radian) minAngle and maxAngle represent a range. That way, each particle has a random angle chosen in that range If you want every particle to move at the same angle, just set minAngle and maxAngle to the same value

    • Method Detail

      • update

        Will move the particle according to its speed and angle
        Overrides:
        update in class ParticleBehavior
        Parameters:
        particle - Particle to update
        See Also:
        ParticleBehavior.update(gameframework.particles.Particle)
